short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Load all the PAL application pages and check server return code 200 (Success).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reloader Chrome extension designed to facilitate the testing of PAL applications. It sequentially loads all pages and checks for 200 status errors, ensuring a controlled testing process that avoids overloading the server.
